actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to authorize Chief Judge Richard T. Haik, of the western district of Louisiana, to participate in the retirement program provided for judicial officials under section 376 of title 28, United States Code.

summary.text: Provides for the treatment of Chief Judge Richard T. Haik of the western district of Louisiana as a judicial official entitled to benefits under provisions regarding annuities for survivors of certain judicial officials.

titles.title: A bill to authorize Chief Judge Richard T. Haik, of the western district of Louisiana, to participate in the retirement program provided for judicial officials under section 376 of title 28, United States Code.
